import sys
while True:
    x=sys.stdin.readline().split()
    y=int(x[1])
    x=int(x[0])
    count=0
    if(x==0 and y==0):
        break
    else:
        a=-1
        b=1
        c=a+b
        
        if c>=x and c<=y:
            count+=1
        else:
            while(1):
                c=a+b
                a=b
                b=c
                if c>=x and c<=y:
                    count+=1

                if c>y:
                    break

    print count
